name: v0.6.1
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6 or greater

1. (Bazel 6 only) Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_vulkan", version = "0.6.1")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_vulkan",
    sha256 = "b91702b8b5cf4226f5aea03904ad5851ea3b0abddafecca4a259874a2caa5aa5",
    strip_prefix = "rules_vulkan-0.6.1",
    url = "https://github.com/myorg/rules_vulkan/releases/download/v0.6.1/rules_vulkan-v0.6.1.tar.gz",
)
```



## What's Changed
* Update dependencies by @mxpv in https://github.com/mxpv/rules_vulkan/pull/50
* Update skylib to fix BCR publish by @mxpv in https://github.com/mxpv/rules_vulkan/pull/51


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/mxpv/rules_vulkan/compare/v0.6.0...v0.6.1

name: v0.6.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6 or greater

1. (Bazel 6 only) Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_vulkan", version = "0.6.0")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_vulkan",
    sha256 = "23d29de97bc76c156100cace1453592baca34ce2d1ba676d1c44f3b059265f62",
    strip_prefix = "rules_vulkan-0.6.0",
    url = "https://github.com/myorg/rules_vulkan/releases/download/v0.6.0/rules_vulkan-v0.6.0.tar.gz",
)
```



## What's Changed
* Update Vulkan SDK versions to 1.4.321.1 by @github-actions[bot] in https://github.com/mxpv/rules_vulkan/pull/38
* Update ShaderInfo to use File objects instead of paths by @mxpv in https://github.com/mxpv/rules_vulkan/pull/39
* Refactor platform detection to use aspect_bazel_lib repo_utils by @mxpv in https://github.com/mxpv/rules_vulkan/pull/40
* Enable direct binary invocation with environment variables by @mxpv in https://github.com/mxpv/rules_vulkan/pull/42
* Update shader group docs by @mxpv in https://github.com/mxpv/rules_vulkan/pull/43
* Add binary field to ShaderInfo provider by @mxpv in https://github.com/mxpv/rules_vulkan/pull/44
* Integrate Gazelle for automatic bzl_library generation by @mxpv in https://github.com/mxpv/rules_vulkan/pull/45
* Fix permissions when extracting bundle on MacOS by @mxpv in https://github.com/mxpv/rules_vulkan/pull/46
* Update Bazel on CI by @mxpv in https://github.com/mxpv/rules_vulkan/pull/49


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/mxpv/rules_vulkan/compare/v0.5.0...v0.6.0

name: v0.5.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6 or greater

1. (Bazel 6 only) Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_vulkan", version = "0.5.0")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_vulkan",
    sha256 = "f1bc1281a406897ead2eff70b86975b35b12f83d0ccaf71ea7abf3a55541c8de",
    strip_prefix = "rules_vulkan-0.5.0",
    url = "https://github.com/myorg/rules_vulkan/releases/download/v0.5.0/rules_vulkan-v0.5.0.tar.gz",
)
```



## What's Changed
* Fix minor spelling mistakes by @Vertexwahn in https://github.com/mxpv/rules_vulkan/pull/14
* Specify custom download URLs for all platforms by @mxpv in https://github.com/mxpv/rules_vulkan/pull/15
* Allow multiple shader inputs in Slang by @mxpv in https://github.com/mxpv/rules_vulkan/pull/19
* Simplify BUILD template by @mxpv in https://github.com/mxpv/rules_vulkan/pull/20
* Allow repository aliases by @mxpv in https://github.com/mxpv/rules_vulkan/pull/21
* Export SDK binaries by @mxpv in https://github.com/mxpv/rules_vulkan/pull/22
* [HLSL] Use .spv extension when targeting spirv by @mxpv in https://github.com/mxpv/rules_vulkan/pull/23
* Use OutputGroupInfo to output metadata files by @mxpv in https://github.com/mxpv/rules_vulkan/pull/24
* Unify Vulkan SDK toolchain and refactor project structure by @mxpv in https://github.com/mxpv/rules_vulkan/pull/25
* Add spirv-cross build target by @mxpv in https://github.com/mxpv/rules_vulkan/pull/26
* Fix imports in the documentation by @mxpv in https://github.com/mxpv/rules_vulkan/pull/27
* Rename download to toolchain by @mxpv in https://github.com/mxpv/rules_vulkan/pull/28
* [slang] Specify output file names by @mxpv in https://github.com/mxpv/rules_vulkan/pull/29
* Add CLAUDE.md by @mxpv in https://github.com/mxpv/rules_vulkan/pull/31
* Add Claude Code GitHub Workflow by @mxpv in https://github.com/mxpv/rules_vulkan/pull/30
* Remove requests dependency from update_versions.py by @mxpv in https://github.com/mxpv/rules_vulkan/pull/32
* Fix typos in documentation and error messages by @mxpv in https://github.com/mxpv/rules_vulkan/pull/33
* Update HLSL shader rule to support custom output file names by @mxpv in https://github.com/mxpv/rules_vulkan/pull/34
* Replace generic outs field with specific file type fields in ShaderInfo by @mxpv in https://github.com/mxpv/rules_vulkan/pull/35
* Update the update script to output properly formatted Starlark code by @mxpv in https://github.com/mxpv/rules_vulkan/pull/36
* Update Vulkan SDK versions to 1.4.321.0 by @github-actions[bot] in https://github.com/mxpv/rules_vulkan/pull/37

## New Contributors
* @Vertexwahn made their first contribution in https://github.com/mxpv/rules_vulkan/pull/14
* @github-actions[bot] made their first contribution in https://github.com/mxpv/rules_vulkan/pull/37

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/mxpv/rules_vulkan/compare/v0.4.0...v0.5.0

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/mxpv/rules_vulkan/compare/v0.3.0...v0.4.0

body:

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/mxpv/rules_vulkan/compare/v0.2.0...v0.3.0
